item.title: Let Live
item.description: [[songs/o/opeth/watershed/burden.md#if-death-should-take-me-now-vyl-wnanory|I was all for you,]] [[songs/o/opeth/watershed/burden.md#if-death-should-take-me-now-vyl-wnanory|You fell over my love,]] [[songs/o/opeth/watershed/burden.md#if-death-should-take-me-now-vyl-wnanory|I just can’t afford it this time.]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/ember/down.md#fight-well-fight-vyl-wnanory|Here’s a story, just bare with me,]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/ember/down.

item.title: When You Can’t Sleep At Night
item.description: [[songs/c/cold_cave/cherish_the_light_years/underworld_usa.md#they-said-the-meek-shall-inherit-the-earth-vyl-wnanory|Here in this world I’m awaked with mistakes,]] [[songs/c/cold_cave/cherish_the_light_years/underworld_usa.md#they-said-the-meek-shall-inherit-the-earth-vyl-wnanory|But it’s love that keeps fueling me, fueling me.]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/empire_let_them_sing.md#its-the-start-of-the-end-surrender-the-throne-vyl-wnanory|Pretty little lady with your swollen eyes,]] [[songs/b/bring_me_the_horizon/sempiternal/empire_let_them_sing.
